title: Trevor Lawrence better pro prospect than Joe Burrow? Draft Focus on National Championship (Football 1/15)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Brady Quinn and Ryan Wilson to react to Monday's National Championship game between LSU and Clemson from an NFL Draft perspective (7:00). The guys evaluate Joe Burrow's stellar performance and if Trevor Lawrence remains a better pro prospect, despite struggling in the title game. Will, Brady and Ryan also highlight the rise of Isaiah Simmons and several other key players that will be playing on Sundays next year. The conversation then shifts to analytics (45:15) and how they serve a purpose in the NFL as what to be wary of when applying them.
